    • 方法详细资料

      • sell

        public Voucher sell(Context respCtx,
           Voucher reqDto)
             throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: VoucherService
        This interface will lookup a valid voucher and return to client. A valid voucher must meet below limits,
        1. the face amount must be same with user's request
        2. must not pass the expire date(for example, can't sell a voucher which will expire in one week)
        3. voucher can't be sold more than once.

        Pre-Condition

        • game must has be allocated to merchant
        • operator/merchant has enough sale balance

        Post-Condition

        • Generate record of VoucherSale.
        • Mark sold voucher as 'sold' status.
        • calculation commission of operator.
        • publish transaction message to RabbitMQ.

        Usage-Restriction

        • Authorization - Can only be called by authorized GPEs.
        • Concurrent Access - To a single device, this interface must be called sequentially. To multiple devices, there are no limitation on the number of concurrent accesses.
        指定者:
        sell 在接口中 VoucherService
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of current transaction.
        reqDto - The DTO of voucher sale request.
        返回:
        A valid voucher instance.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - if encounter a business exception.

      • supportedReversalRoutineKey

        public RoutineKey supportedReversalRoutineKey()
        从接口复制的说明: ReversalOrCancelStrategy
        Determine what kind of transaction will be cancelled/reversed by the concrete ReversalOrCancelStrategy implementation.
        指定者:
        supportedReversalRoutineKey 在接口中 ReversalOrCancelStrategy
        覆盖:
        supportedReversalRoutineKey 在类中 AbstractReversalOrCancelStrategy
        另请参阅:

      • cancelOrReverse

        public boolean cancelOrReverse(Context<?> respCtx,
                      Transaction targetTrans)
                        throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: ReversalOrCancelStrategy
        Cancel the target transaction.
        指定者:
        cancelOrReverse 在接口中 ReversalOrCancelStrategy
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of cancellation request.
        targetTrans - The transaction which is intended to be cancelled.
        返回:
        true if cancel declined, or false.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
